me.gandhiinc.blindeye

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.gandhiinc.blindeye.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    --------------------------------------------------------- -------------------- PLAYER ------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------- This where all of the information for each player is along with all of the actions they can perform. It contains the following methods: - AcquirePlot(Plot plot) - SpecialiseRoboticon(Roboticon roboticon, Resource resource) - ProduceResources() And then getters and setters for the resources along with a getter for a list of roboticons and functionality to add a roboticon
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Steven Tomlinson

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              int money,
              int ore,
              int energy)
        The is the constructor of the Player class to instantiate a new instance of the Player class
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player object i.e Player 1
        money - The starting money of the player
        ore - The starting ore of the player
        energy - The starting energy of the player

      • AcquirePlot

        public void AcquirePlot(Plot plot)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This allows the player to acquire a new plot which in turn adds the plot to the list of plots the player owns
        Parameters:
        plot - The plot which is going to be acquired.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the plot already belongs to a player

        public void SpecialiseRoboticon(Roboticon roboticon,
                                Resource resource)
        Allow the player to specialise their roboticon to a given a resource
        Parameters:
        roboticon - The roboticon to be specialised
        resource - The resource the roboticon will be specialised for

        public void ProduceResources()
